name: related_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_alternative.
Tool description: Get data similar to YouTube Data API v3 from this API. Check latest version: [YT-API](https://rapidapi.com/ytjar/api/yt-api)
API description: Fetches videos related to a specified video using the YouTube V3 API.

is_id.description: The ID of the video for which to fetch related videos.

x_cachebypass.description: Cache bypass parameter; pass '1' to bypass the cache. Defaults to None.

geo.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region (e.g., 'US', 'UK', 'CA'). Defaults to 'US'.

lang.description: Locale/language for the request (e.g., 'en', 'gb', 'hi'). Defaults to 'en'.

token.description: Pagination token for fetching additional results. Defaults to None.
